Eleventy, webmentions and my new site

29 January, 2021

It's finally done. I migrated my site from WordPress to a static site generated by eleventy. I've also managed to get webmentions working of a sort. Many thanks for all the great help available on the internet.

I list here some sites I found especially helpful, but of course there are many others who gave me a nudge in the right direction.

Eleventy

In addition to the great documentation, the following were particularly helpful for me:

  • Getting started with eleventy
  • Eleventy introduction
  • Turn jekyll up to eleventy

Webmentions

  • Guide by Max B√∂ck on using webmentions with eleventy
    • And his excellent starter template
  • Amber Wilson's overview of webmentions which lead me to Max B√∂ck's post
  • Aaron Parecki's webmention.io service for receiving webmentions
  • And of course the IndieWeb

Others

  • Mardown syntax guide
  • Mozilla nunjucks guide
